testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: And I type the keyboard shortcut to open the Math Editor and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: When I type "a/b" in the Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: And I submit the dialog with the keyboard shortcut
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: Then I see the "a/b" Math Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: And I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: Then I assert that the "a/b" math is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: And I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new question and test launching the dialog using keyboard shortcuts

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Create a new question and test clicking cancel in the math editor dialog ?[90m# MathEditorDialog.feature:23?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.chooseCreatingNewQuestionFromMainDropdownButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mQuestion Designer is opened?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertQuestionDesignerPageIsOpened()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click inside the question text editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsideQuestionTextEditor()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Equation Editor button to open the Math Editor dialog and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickMathEditorButton()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI type "?[0m?[32m?[1ma/b?[0m?[32m" in the Equation Editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.typeText(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Cancel in the Math Editor dialog?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.cancelDialog()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI don't see the "?[0m?[32m?[1ma/b?[0m?[32m" Math Widget in the question text section?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertMathWidgetIsNotInserted(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the question designer Save & Close button?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickSaveAndCloseButton()?[0m
